title: The Damned. Official Movie Trailer [HD]
description:
In theaters: August 29th, 2014

Description:

THE DAMNED tells the story of American David Reynolds (Peter Facinelli), widowed from his Colombian-born wife, who flies to Bogota with his new fiancÃƒÂ©e (Sophia Myles) to retrieve his rebellious teenage daughter Jill (Nathalia Ramos). En route to the city of Medellin, a car accident leaves them stranded in a run-down isolated inn. When they discover the old innkeeper has locked a young girl in the basement, they are determined to set her free. In saving the young girl, they ultimately unleash an ancient evil that's been waiting to wreak havoc on all that cross its path.

Genre: Thriller, Horror

Director: Victor Garcia

Actors: Peter Facinelli, Sophia Myles, Nathalia Ramos, Sebastian Martinez

Writers: Richard D'Ovidio, David Higgins
